    Teaching in Grad School

    As a graduate student at Harvard, I was a teaching fellow in:

    • AM 126/MCB 111. Statistics and Inference in Biology with Sharad Ramanathan and Michael Desai
    • SPU 27. Science and Cooking: From Haute Cuisine to Soft Matter Science (as Head Teaching Fellow) with Michael Brenner, David Weitz, and Pia Sorensen
    • MCB 291. Genetics, Genomics, and Evolution with Andrew Murray and Cassandra Extavour
    • MCB 52. Molecular Biology with Richard Losick and Briana Burton

    â€¦for which I was honored to receive the Harvard Harold T. White Prize for Excellence in the Teaching of Physics and two Harvard University Certificates of Distinction in Teaching.
